column2: Amber is extracted here, and traded with the Chaos Dwarves for valuable weapons and armour.
Animals are slaughtered here, and used to feed the Hordes.
The tannery works day and night, preparing clothing for loyal servants of Chaos.
Valuable Gems mined here, and traded with the Chaos Dwarves for valuable weapons and armour.
Gold is mined here, and traded with the Chaos Dwarves for valuable weapons and armour.
The smithy works day and night, enhancing the quality of our weapons and armour.
The Medic brings fallen warriors back into the fray, sometimes with an additional arm or two.
Obsidian is extracted here, and traded with the Chaos Dwarves for valuable weapons and armour.
Even the Hordes of Chaos need containers to keep their items in.
Salt is mined here, and used to preserve food for the Hordes
Timber is used for building and helps assert the control of the Hordes over their territories.
